<h1>Introduction</h1>
We spend far too much time immobile, but such is the life of a scholar.
This page has mobility, flexibility, and cardiovascular exercises that will help to keep your body happy while you are growing your mind.

<!--
*
* Physical Fitness Links
*
-->

<h1>Physical Fitness</h1>

<!--
*
* Yoga
*
-->

<h2>Yoga</h2>
Low impact stretching exercises.
I started doing yoga about a two years ago.
I'm on the overweight side and have had lower back issues for most of my adult life.
Yoga has been the best thing to happen to my lower back by far.
100/10, would highly recommend.

<table border="1" width="100%">
  <!-- Cassandra's 20 Min Morning -->
  <tr>
    <td valign="top" width="20%">
      <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EuAwhogdukQ&t=4s">Cassandra's 20 Min Morning</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
    </td>
    <td valign="top">
      A great 20 minute morning yoga routine.
      Excellent for beginners and can be modified as your abilities grow.
      This is where I started my yoga journey and I haven't looked back.
      Best thing to happen to me physical fitness wise since high school sports.
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
